name: Final Eclipse
description:
Final Eclipse is a pseudo-3d, grid based shooter type of game. It was originally created in the ika engine for a 2 week competition in the summer of 2003, and now is being revived using Pygame. It is seeing rapid progress in new features, and I can't wait for everyone to be able to play it. 

I have uploaded the original ika version here, see the included readme.txt for instructions on how to run the game and the controls.
